mdRecordxmlns.dcterms:title: Welcome! Here He Comes With the Facts!
mdRecordxmlns.dcterms:creator: Leasure, Al
mdRecordxmlns.dcterms:description: (Elected to the fifth term of house of delegates without opposition!)"Welcome! Here he comes with the facts!""Gentlemen! Whom do I see to get a locker?"(Rush D. Holt of W.Va.)(Active in youth program!)(7 year old daughter Helen Jane a Brownie Scout!)(National Council Boy Scouts of America!)(As early as 1927 wrote articles calling for cleanup of state mental hospitals long before holding or aspiring to any political office!)
The cartoon is part of a set that was made into a small booklet.
mdRecordxmlns.dcterms:subject: American
Cartoons (Commentary)
Holt, Rush Dew, 1905-1955
Politics and government
West Virginia
